name: Pi Punchout
description:
Student game 'Pi Punchout' 2016.
Play as experiment #3.14 - Codename: Pi
Use your giant hands to punch random objects into your enemies and knock them off the arena. Contains a campaign mode and 2-4 local multiplayer.

Unity 3D, 1st Person Brawler.

Contains: Action, Violence, Language, Suggestive Themes.

Pi Punchout was created by undergraduate students from the University of Central Florida's Game Design program. Within 2 months the students students start from concept pitches, prototyping, game design document drafting, vertical slice, Alpha, document revisions, and a final RTM.

Game Designers

Silver Raul Colon- Programming, 3D Modeling, Texturing

Trevor Goodwin- Lead Programming, Character Modeling

Kristal Nembhard- 3D Modeling, Texturing

Tiffanie Nguyen- 3D Modeling, Texturing, 2D Artist

Christine Wright- Sound Design, Composer, 2D Artist

Mitchell Zelik- Character Rigging, Animation, Documentation

Special Thanks

Parker Andersen- Voice Actor, (The Announcer)
